lender.name: SeeTryFly
lender.loan_because: Everyone can do one small thing to help another, no matter what our circumstances. There's enough in the world for everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I have four children. I do odd jobs to help support my family including teaching, making clothing and doing some computer work. I love to cook for my family and we grow a small garden as well!

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I can still particapate and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.occupation: field hockey coach and restaurant server

lender.name: Buster
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves. I think that most people prefer a "helping hand" to "hand out" and want to make their own way in society.
lender.occupational_info: I review building permits for houses, fences, swimming pools, and other structures people want to build on their property.

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: I belive in the golden rule, "Do unto others as you would have them do unto you." To be a part of giving someone hope is a true blessing to me.

lender.name: Yes We Can
lender.loan_because: I can... and I should.

lender.name: Alison & Chris
lender.loan_because: we like to see people succeed in their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Alison creates web sites for people and businesses, and Chris designs software that is used in the health care industry around the world.

lender.name: Jay & Amy
lender.loan_because: we are so excited to be part of what God is doing in people's lives - to help them achieve their dreams and make their families more prosperous.

lender.name: Angie & Shannon
lender.loan_because: poverty allows bad people to commit corruption and abuse against the poor who are so busy trying to physically save their lives each day through the aquisition of food and shelter that they have no time to devote to creating the political and cultural changes neccessary to end their oppression by those who benefit greatly from abusing others, especially women and children. Creating jobs is one of the most important things we can do for people everywhere. Any of us familiar with US History know that job creation is vital to our freedom from oppression because rather than just struggling to survive each day we have time to monitor our government through participation in the political proccess . Without jobs we would be an oppressed third world nation subject to the abuse of the many who are cruel enough to oppress for their own profits and pleasures in life. Jobs give us a voice and the opportunity to express it through our making of laws for our benefit as a society in whole rather than for the benefit of the 10 percent of our population that would choose their selfish pleasures at the exzpense of anyone. Whether those are corrupt corporate leaders (most of whom are decent people), child molestors, corupt government officials, people who drink and drive and kill a person every 29 minutes in our country or whomever wants to be destructive for their own pleasure, Our ability to have good paying jobs allows us a voice against their evil and we hope that for you as well.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are well paid laborers, cleaning homes and doing construction work. We participate in politics both local and national. We love the outdoors. Neither of us has any past or current addictions to substances that interfer with our achieving a high quality of life. We love lots of outdoor activites and we love helping people. We live modestly so we can help others. We also sponser a family in Africa.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: A fantastic way to help people make a difference in their lives. A small investment by many can jump start an individual's business.

lender.name: SHERRY
lender.loan_because: I try and be the example to my students in giving back makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I love teaching, making kids think.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the entreprenurial spirit. Give a man a fish, feed him for a day - teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and/or create businesses, build them up and sell them eventually or take in a working partner who has a vested interest.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in prosperity through self motivation and hard work. All these people need is a little help to get it started.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies create and implement business process changes

lender.name: Hotse
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and am beyond grateful - this is a nice way to give some back and touch others across the world
lender.occupational_info: institutional bond trader - work with great sums of funds every day - at times one looses perspective how a real difference can be made....

lender.name: Lalana
lender.loan_because: It feels good and great to see a face with the loan on this site. You feel more involved.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Yoga for your mind, body and soul!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe when we stop waiting for "the world" to care, and we start to engage ourselves, we see profound change. I have spent months in the developing world, and am excited to partner with people who are willing to work towards a better life. Why wouldn't I want to offer a hand up?
lender.occupational_info: Ever felt unwelcome at a building that's associated with a religion? I work to make sure that doesn't happen anymore.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: It is important to help us each others.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: when you reach out and touch a heart or a life, the world changes.

lender.name: Black Squirrel Portfolio
lender.loan_because: To empower lives.
lender.occupational_info: The Black Squirrel Portfolio is an economic development fund of BFL Improvement Enterprises to improve human and social conditions for a positive change.

lender.name: Debbi
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrative assistant for a National Sales Director for Mary Kay Cosmetics.

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a beautiful family and a healthy life. it is time to give some back
lender.occupational_info: retired wine maker

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make a difference, one slice of life at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a great digital marketing company that is transforming the world of marketing.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: As much as I complain, I have been given a blessed life and I want to be able to offer people tassistance as they create a blessed life for themsleves
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Sometimes being just a drop in the ocean is enough.
lender.occupational_info: My daughters are my greatest joy.

lender.name: Utah U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service
Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurships around the world are key to building economic justice.
lender.occupational_info: I spread awareness about great causes and help them raise money to do good in the world.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of business to drive social change.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write about 'base of the pyramid' (BoP) business strategies, highlighting the potential of the world's poorest citizens as entrepreneurs, employees and discerning consumers.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on someone that is in need. By helping the people on Kiva, I am also helping out people within that particular community.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the best ideas I've heard of to empower individuals in economically depressed regions.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Health Physicist and currently work for the state of Ohio providing licensing, consultation and inspections for radioactive material licensees within the state of Ohio.

lender.name: Petri
lender.loan_because: I believe that if others got the same help I have received from my family, they could help others by their good deeds.

lender.name: Gian Paolo
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering -not pitying- others leads to real and sustainable growth.

lender.name: CJ the donkey momma
lender.loan_because: As a self-employed single woman, I know how difficult it can be to start up and run a small business. After 25+ years success in my own businesses, I am honored to share that energy with others who wish to work their way to better circumstances. I am particularly happy to assist those who work with the earth and our animal relations, as this resonates with my spirit.

lender.name: Russ & Joelle
lender.loan_because: We travel and see the needs of people. This is a way for us to help other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: For the simplicity that it's all about ONE race - the HUMAN race.
lender.occupational_info: My family comes before anything else....I work for a construction company in Las Vegas, Nevada.

lender.name: Jan
lender.occupational_info: starting new churches

lender.name: Jim & Jackie
lender.loan_because: The best hope for the human race to succeed is to all work together.

lender.name: Michelle Menhennet
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do, and it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a child protection worker

lender.name: Paschal
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Make sure my clients do not look at their computers as monsters.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Global Free Market Capitalism is good for everyone.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I live a wonderful life in San Francisco where I feel fortunate to have the means to provide tangible assistance to our global community where gender, cultural and economic realites are often obstacles for women.
lender.occupational_info: I manage programs for clients. I consult with clients to define what they want from my company, then I lead my company's teams to deliver it (e.g. customized software, marketing program, website, etc.)

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to give others great opportunities that they may not have had otherwise in life. I am only 24 and don't have a lot to give but just knowing you are helping even a little means a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I help support and protect large networks of computers that businesses have. Their security is very important because if they lose all of their private data or they lose their customers information, they lose the foundation of their business.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I am willing, able and ready
lender.occupational_info: community work with drug addicts

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupation: Therapist For Children Who Have Been Diagnosed Wit

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting small businesses and am grateful for a chance to have a direct impact on another's life

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to reach for their dreams.

lender.name: Jas, Christa and Kaya
lender.loan_because: We want to help others achieve better lives for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are dedicated educators

lender.name: Vance
lender.loan_because: I was born into a very poor family and know how it feels to be turned down while trying to borrow money to start a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled and no longer can work

lender.name: 1TrueBroncoFan
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes!
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: Yusleydis
lender.loan_because: I found out about this website through Y100 radio station and it sounded interesting so i checked it out and i liked it and decide to join.

lender.name: Tansey & Paul K.
lender.loan_because: My husband and I want to make a difference. We want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I give advice to people who have health problems, or want to remain well using natural methods only. I also make homemade medicines from herbs. I work through http://mindbodyspiritconnection.ecrater.com/

lender.name: Linda A
lender.loan_because: In this world where so many have so much, and yet, so many more have so little, we must do what we can. I believe in the interdependent web of existence. It will take all of us to save the planet and each other.

lender.name: Silas
lender.loan_because: I've been given a great deal in life, and I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Susan and John
lender.loan_because: I can. We have been blessed to be born into a community that is privileged. We want to share some of our good luck and good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Susan is a teacher who teaches young children in elementary/primary school. John works with computers.

lender.name: Mariale & Jose
lender.loan_because: People deserve an opportunity no matter where they are or where they are from.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: To me the greatest feeling in the world is giving to and hleping those that need us.

lender.name: Usman & Ayesha
lender.loan_because: God helps those who help others.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Jesus calls us to give to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school training to become a pastor.

lender.name: Tod
lender.loan_because: I has been very fortunate, and want to help others to achieve their goals.

lender.name: In Memory of Lori Miller
lender.loan_because:
I lost my dear wife to cancer at the young age of just 31. She cared so much for those who had fewer opportunities, and always wanted to help out in any way possible--even when she was so sick herself.
I am making my loans in her name, because it is something she would have believed in whole-heartedly---real people, all around the world, reaching out to help each other in their time of need.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I wish you success in your projects.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because:
All of us in this world are connected. We are all one.
Our loans represent Christmas funds we would have spent on adults in our family. Each family member is therefore contributing to these loans.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I believe I can help people in developing countries improve the lives of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a public high school.

lender.name: Tri
lender.occupational_info: Manager

lender.name: Ian Mansfield
lender.loan_because: It is personally empowering to be able to give a little bit of help directly to people who have a plan to improve their lifes though their own hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I write about telecommunications and run a few internet websites. I get most pleasure writing about how telecoms helps developing countries to help themselves.

lender.name: Boudewijn
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital helping people with lung/breathing problems.

lender.name: ROOM 188 - SOUTH
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Michael & Lea
lender.loan_because: We are very thankful for all we have. We would like others to experience the joys of success. We wish all a wonderful and productive year.
lender.occupational_info: Small start up business owner - Athena Allergy. We specialize in Nickel Allergy (ear rings, etc contain nickel).

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I invest money for profit

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given - much is expected.

lender.name: VINU
lender.loan_because: To help people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I hope to experience good outcomes

lender.name: Leone
lender.loan_because: I'm an extremely lucky person who wants to share the good things in my life with others.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone else a chance like someone gave to me. A chance to run a business and earn a good living.
lender.occupational_info: I flew airplanes and sprayed crops to kill damaging weeds,insects and plant deseases.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: I find money for people to buy homes.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I started my own small publishing company with $1,700 over four years ago, and I'm still in business, so I know it can be done.
lender.occupational_info: I find original, unusual novels that most mainstream publishers turn down because of the concern that they won't sell. My business model allows me to focus on content without worrying about the market figures - and keep my titles in print.

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: It takes a lot for someone to actively change their own life. No matter what country you live in you should be afforded the opportunity of trust.
lender.occupational_info: i help people find homes

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone deserves a chance to try and make it in this life, and if i can help i will.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: This money can be used better elsewhere, especially where it's "worth more" by being able to do more. What can you buy with the same amount here in the US?...almost nothing as worthwhile as what it can be used for by these loan recipients. And it's much more exciting than betting at the track. Better returns too!
lender.occupational_info: I transport documents, film, and other things around my city for people and businesses, from office to office or home when they need it urgently.

lender.name: Helen and Jeff
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for all that we've been blessed with and want to help others become financially stable.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff and Helen are both accountants.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I think this method of helping people is great. I saw it on CNN one day, and while sitting at the computer I looked Kiva.org up. What a wonderful way to lend a hand. By the Grace of God go we. Thank you, Kiva.

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: none of us are free until we're all free.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: a small loan can bring one person out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Project manager with the UN

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of donating some of my relative wealth to people needing a leg up to earn the same for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct investigations for attorneys defending people accused of crimes. I conduct investigations for attorneys and others in civil matters.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Change happens one person at a time.

lender.name: Drake
lender.loan_because: I believe that access to finance opportunities ought not to be available just for the rich and privileged. Resources ought to be available for all driven people to lift themselves to a higher condition.
lender.occupational_info: I consult on IT issues for the US government related to collaborating more efficiently with the citizens they represent.

lender.name: Becky
lender.occupational_info: Happy, kind and hard working

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other people, especially people who have the will and initiative to help themselves.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: This IS the way to uplift Africa and many other impoverished countries. Giving billion dollar grants to corrupt govts achieves NOTHING other than enriching the rulers. They NEVER do anything for their people.
lender.occupational_info: Advisor, Investor to small medium size business.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: The only way I would be happier than making this loan is if I were working for Kiva helping facilitate the loans and the only way I could be happier than that is if I had created this brilliant system myself.
lender.occupational_info: I answer all calls received at our police station emergency to administration, as well as working the radio ensuring the safety of our officers, background research, direct people who walk in the station and maintain our national database records. When there is time to chat with those around me I discover what a great team I am working for. We have lots of laughs which helps to relieve the stress.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been very blessed by the Lord in our lives and we want to do what we can to help others accomplish their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that recruits senior level executives for companies in the Life Sciences area and my husband is a senior financial professional for a technology company.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: To give something back to society.
lender.occupational_info: Of completely no use to society.

lender.name: The Ingalls
lender.loan_because: you should help your neighbor.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I loan in honor of those that came before me and the lessons learned from observing their willingness to help those in need.....and to add another voice of approval and gratitude to those that have invented such a place as this!!
lender.occupational_info: My passions are my family and my collecting habits.

lender.name: InterVarsity USF
lender.loan_because: We want to spread God's love!
lender.occupational_info: We're a Christian Fellowship at the University of San Francisco.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: ... I'd like to help however I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help start up businesses in technology and on the web.

lender.name: IAIN
lender.loan_because: i want help

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: Since we hit the jackpot just by being born in North america, I feel we are very fortunate to be able to have the opportunity to help others. I think these microlans are a fabulous idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepenuer who started my business at the age of 21. It is a vacuum sales & service store.

lender.name: Dexter & Shermane
lender.loan_because: for a selfish reason. It makes me feel good. Besides, these folks can use the loans for a good purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, sometimes the students learn. When they do, it is good. When they don't, not so good.

lender.name: asha
lender.loan_because: If all it takes is a helping hand for someone to make his or her life better, I have both my hands to offer. I am most fortunate to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer in the computer technology field, and my job involves creating computer software for safe information exchange in a company in America. I live in California and my other job is to be the best Mom that I can be to my newborn baby.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Little bits add up to great things.
lender.occupational_info: I make advertising. Quite often, the kind of advertising that helps people have better lives, whether it's quitting smoking or eating better.

lender.name: Vitas
lender.loan_because: What goes around ... comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I travel throughout the United States helping businesses with their computer problems and projects.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: because i have so much.
lender.occupational_info: i am a retired state social worker

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: There is a need and I can help someone improve their family's life.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Sheila & Bob
lender.loan_because: we are all one family and family helps family

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepeneur. I manufacture rubber art stamps and that is how we support our household and I think everyone has two hands can make something!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: each person has the ability to help another person by extending a hand when they can. By loaning on Kiva, I am giving a hand-up, not a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: As a fundraiser for a social justice university, I see myself as a conduit for people who want to change the world. On one side are the donors who want to change the world by contributing their passion and resources to a school. On the other side are the students who need an education on their way to change the world. All parties in this relationship are change agents, and each of us (philanthropist, student and fundraiser) are necessary to make change happen.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I just want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Stressful yet fun

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I believe an important part of stabilizing the global community as a whole is giving all people the opportunity to provide for themselves and others, especially through sustainable small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I attend an International Baccalaureate World School.

lender.name: Bryan, Phil & Patrick
lender.loan_because: We think it is important to be a participant in the global community.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe every human being deserves basic dignity, and this kind of innovative idea helps many people achieve just that.
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards my BS degree in Environmental Science at the University here in Kansas City, Missouri.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to feel connected to people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with lots of teams of people to produce graphics software.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I grew up on a farm, and believe that farming is a great profession and way of life.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: we need to help each other

lender.name: Solmaz
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time dental student living in NYC.

lender.name: Franco
lender.loan_because: As a 6 year old immigrant from Baghdad, Iraq I witnessed war, poverty and the everyday poor quality of life. Coming to a new country my Parents struggled with raising 3 children, working two sometimes three jobs at a time just so they can escape from the life they once had to survive from, and offer a future for their children. I believe as a parents, it is our obligation to our children.
lender.occupational_info: We are National Mortgage Company. We help current and new home owners secure financing to for the purchase of a home. In addition to our Mortgage Company we provide business Loans, Lines of Credit and Commercial financing for growing business.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: i want to do something to encourage development in areas of need, especially in sustainable fishing and agriculture.
lender.occupational_info: i am a biological oceanographer by training but am currently working in environmental monitoring and remediation. i have also started commercial fishing with my partner who has fished for over 20 yrs in Alaska waters. fishing brings me closer to my interests.

lender.loan_because: I am interested in seeing the world develop as mine has.

lender.name: Patty & MIke
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Meghana
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: SELASE
lender.loan_because: I want to expand my grasscutter farms
lender.occupational_info: is very good job

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to bring as much joy to others as I have been blessed to receive.

lender.name: Jean and Natalie
lender.loan_because: We have great respect for those who have an entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: We both teach high school students 14 to 19 years old. We teach English, Sciences and Math.

lender.name: Socrates
lender.loan_because: A little from those who are able to give, can make a lot of difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: Currently working for an online retail company.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Nancy

lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepeneur and we make our own line of rubber art stamps that we sell exclusively online. We make everything by by hand with great pride.

lender.name: Joseph & Donna
lender.loan_because: someone helped us in our greatest time of need and we now wish to bless others.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: "Mankind was my business. The common welfare was my business: charity, mercy, forbearance, and benevolence, were, all, my business."
lender.occupational_info: I now ferry people in a small boat.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: other people need the money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I learn at school.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's a great, easy way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a unique individual - just like everyone else- ha ha

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Wil teaches geography and history and Michelle teaches English as a Second Language

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Its an interesting way to contribute to the lives of others in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Presently, I'm pursuing a Master's of Arts degree in Geography at State University of New York at Buffalo.
http://www.acsu.buffalo.edu/~mam23

lender.name: John Bennett
lender.loan_because: Philanthropy is important in life. You have a chance to give to those who are less fortunate, a gift to help them improve their life and make a difference. I have found that with KIVA's legitimacy and mission that KIVA would best facilitate that process in the best way possible!
lender.occupational_info: I invest, sell and buy real estate and other investment opportunities.

lender.name: PhiSC
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: We are optomistic students!

lender.name: Jill J
lender.loan_because: It's all about people helping people, giving back what someone has given to you along life's journey. One of God's many gifts are our hands. I support those who work using the creative process!
lender.occupational_info:
I work with teenagers, developing their artistic potential, in a daily classroom setting. (drawing, painting, sculpture, & pottery)
I work with teenagers developing their artistic potential.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have lived abroad and continue travel. I have witnessed the struggles of good people. Everyone deserves an opportunity to elevate themselves and provide for their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect aircraft and develope repairs. I am also a consultant to the aviation industry.

lender.name: Butch
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've reached the juncture in my life where I now have the capability to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired United States Marine with 21 years of faithful service to my God & country.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: it's a way to personally feel like I can make a difference. This is a more personal and direct way to help people be self sufficient than what I have done in the past by making donations to an organization.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because:
kiva is a brilliant idea for contributing to sustainable development around the world.
see my story on kiva here on yahoo news,
http://potw.news.yahoo.com/s/potw/37837/the-10-million-giveaway;_ylt=Aowt8JsFPfGUKgZm9keDJ0cKwId4
lender.occupational_info: i'm a multi-media reporter who primarily covers the world's conflict zones.

lender.name: Priya
lender.loan_because: I want to be socially responsible.

lender.name: David Grant
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer at Kodak Graphics and Communications Group

lender.name: BABU & BAMA
lender.loan_because: It is a moral responsibility to help others. On one hand it provides a means of livelihood across the planet, on the other hand, numerous ideas can hopefully see fruition because they receive funding at the most opportune moment.
lender.occupational_info: International Development

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school principal and psychologist because I love education, love helping others, and want to make a difference.

lender.name: K & H
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies decide where to locate and invest.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: i want to help other,less fortunate, women and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I run the office for my husband's business and run the household which is kept alive and bustling with teenage boys and friends.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I'm proud of the fact that I worked hard to get where I am today. I want to help others who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Computer network administrator for a federal law enforcement agency.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I went on a mission trip to Monterrey, Mexico and it changed my world-view forever. I have a real heart for the poor, and I know that all anybody needs is a fair chance. My desire is to be a social entrepreneur in my own way. But until the end, the stories of groups like KIVA give me hope and inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I am attempting to start my own business where I can use all profits to fund the outreaches we will do. In that sense it will be a business as a mission.

lender.name: Monty
lender.loan_because: I believe the best use of my life is in the service to mankind.
lender.occupational_info: Fire extinguishment, medical response, and public service.

lender.name: Liza & Norman Banta
lender.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur all my life so I know how hard it is to succeed in business. God has blessed our family with abundance, good health and happiness and I am so happy through KIVA to be able to give other entrepreneurs a hand up through micro loans and help them succeed too. God Bless!
lender.occupational_info: After dabbling in many different businesses, we have found "love" and stability in real estate. We provide corporate and vacation rental condos in Waikiki on the island of Oahu in Hawaii, USA. Hawaii is truly paradise and we are blessed to be able to live and play in one of the most beautiful places on earth.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: To help others help themselves.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to share directly, supporting each other in our work!
lender.occupational_info: Episcopal nun; we grow most of our own food organically, and our focus is to live sustainably, act in socially just ways, and support spiritual fulfillment for all.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me get started.

lender.name: Cherie
lender.loan_because: I can help someone else achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Cashier at a grocery/ food store.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-loans are a way to help people help themselves while retaining their dignity. It's exciting to choose a new person to loan to after a loan has been paid back. Average people like me CAN make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a special education teacher.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Although I have a full time job, I love to make jewelry and think that this is a great idea to help a fellow entrepreneur.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I work for a prominent Liver Transplant Surgeon, he is an amazing surgeon and a wonderful humanitarian

lender.name: Tom & Karen
lender.loan_because: It works!
lender.occupational_info: Karen worked in HR for the NYC Housing Authority. Tom was first in the newspaper business - then manufacturing.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give to people in ways that empower them.
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a small church.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I raised 3 kids on my own.....and now that I can, I am rewarded by helping others who need a hand. It's one way I can show appreciation for my being blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in labor management representing a federal science agency and taught English (ESOL) to immigrants in the Washington, DC. area. .

lender.name: Shari'sFamily
lender.loan_because: As a family, we want to be a part of helping others fulfill their dreams... so as we gather together every Christmas, each of us will put whatever we can afford into a beautiful silver Christmas stocking chosen especially for this purpose... it might be $.10 from one of our children or $100 from another family member... the amount doesn't matter... it's all about the giving. We will then use that money to provide loans throughout the coming year.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I started lending as a project, but then continued to lend even after the project was due.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day; if you teach a man to fish, you will feed him for a lifetime. I believe that capital support is what is needed to help people pull themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: I write Computer Software Applications.

lender.name: Francisco Aguilar
lender.loan_because: we want to help to grow up you own bussines.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Operation Manager in the cleaning industry and Iam so busy every days. Thaks GOD.......

lender.name: Dr. Henry Svec
lender.loan_because: My practice www.drsvec.com has adopted Kiva as its' charity.
lender.occupational_info: Own a number of businesses including the Dr. Svec Institute and Rehabilitation Clinics

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am an independent business owner and love it. I empower others to do the same so we all may live a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I create safe and sacred space where I share an environment so people may heal their mind,body,spirit, and emotions through a non-invasive form of bodywork. I also educate and consult on how one may change their lifestyle in every way toward living natural and preventing sickness. Improving quality of life.

lender.name: Jason and Courtney Dirks
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We help creative entrepreneurs (artists, crafters, photographers, etc.) build and develop their businesses online!

lender.name: ROWDY
lender.loan_because: I love to help people
lender.occupational_info: Running, eating, sleeping on the couch/Laz-y-boy.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info:
"Few will have the greatness to bend history; but each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation ...
It is from numberless diverse acts of courage and belief that human history is thus shaped. Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring, those ripples build a current which can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance."
Robert F. Kennedy June 6, 1966
Complete text : http://www.jfklibrary.org/Research/Ready-Reference/RFK-Speeches/Day-of-Affirmation-Address-news-release-text-version.aspx

lender.name: Trogo
lender.loan_because: I believe in free market capitalism and helping folks achieve their dreams and aspirations. My first job out of college was teaching English to children in South Korea. On my travels I strive to experience first hand and up-close the positive and negative ideals that the United States has spread across this great world. I believe that with these loans, I can make a difference in promoting peace, justice, and understanding around the globe. It would bring me great pleasure to see others across the world prosper as I have.
lender.occupational_info: Slightly stressful and exciting.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: it's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: Harini
lender.loan_because: I want to help the needy become self-sufficient rather than dependent on charity so they don't lose their pride and dignity. I would like to see those in economic hardships come out of poverty and improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent market research analyst in the healthcare sector, specifically medical device and pharmaceutical and biotechnology.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help but never knew how. I am thrilled that my small donation can make a huge change in somebody else's life.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: Others have given me a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people tells their stories.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Revolving Credit for Heaven!

lender.name: Gaela
lender.loan_because: Where someone needs a hand up, it is my honor to provide it.
lender.occupational_info: I work making maps for a local government agency, but my main priority is going to University of California, Davis in the U.S., where I study Biology.

lender.name: Ed & "B"
lender.loan_because: We travel internationally and enjoy giving back to those areas we visit .
lender.occupational_info: Retired banker and retired high school principal

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I can, so I should.

lender.name: Cely
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and goal in life.

lender.name: Miracle Noodle Team
lender.occupation: We sell our calorie free Miracle Noodles
lender.loan_because: A percentage of every sale on our website supports our two favorite charities, the Acumen Fund and kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: We believe that empowerment through entrepeneurship is the most powerful form of change possible. It elevates families and communities at all levels, promotes equality of opportunity, and gives hope through self-determination.

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: I saw this on the Oprah show and it just touched us. I hope everyone can just see this site. It's just great!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I'm in customer service, However, I am a big animal lover and love the rescue sites as well. Love doing for others.......people or animals, doesn't matter because we are all in it together anyway. We all need to help any way we can!

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, as others have helped me start my businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I sell items online to others and work with others to start a website.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Its the correct thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I have...why not give? It makes me truly happy to be able to help others in need....it's their gift to me.
lender.occupational_info: I have three jobs. 1) I work full time for a leading technology institution 2) I teach at another institution and 3) I started my own business Yeah, I'm busy (but driven!)

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a marketing agency. I design marketing campaigns. I work with others to implement them and I measure their impacts.

lender.name: malcolm
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of microcredit and it is a great way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Cary & Sharon
lender.loan_because: People need other people
lender.occupational_info: We are in a business that helps other people. Our company is taking the mass money and giving back to the little guy.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world, even if it is $25 at time.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: People need help and this is an easy way to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I organize real estate transactions.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are willing to help themselves. We all can work together to make this world a better place.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Good karma is it's own reward...
lender.occupational_info: I am an aspiring grant writer and a stay at home mom of two young children.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be better off than so many other people. Feels good to give back a little...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a SAP consultant who helps large organizations set up their information systems. These systems do a lot of things but i work in the areas that record sales, send out bills, account the incoming money and prepare reports about all that is happening.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info:
My husband and I have been married for almost 18 years. We live in Southern California. We have 3 children ( Cole 17, Trevor 15, & Jessalyn 14).
My husband works for a Geothermal Power Plant. They produce electricity for Southern California.
I am salesman for a Petroleum Company. I have been selling petroleum products for the last 2 years. Prior to that I was an office manager .

lender.name: Ankur
lender.loan_because: I just want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell stock, options and futures. The goal is to profit from price change with trades lasting anywhere from several seconds to several weeks.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I love that I can help someone and I get to see that person and their project,how they live,how they improve, and know that I made a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, author and photographer. I love to travel.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: By helping others to have a chance to better life for themselves and their families, we all become a little closer.
lender.occupational_info: I make images of where people live their lives.

lender.name: Ray and Maureen
lender.loan_because: God has given us so many material blessings and we just want to share a little with someone who might need a little help. "...If you have two coats, give one to the poor. If you have food, share it with those who are hungry," Luke 3:11
lender.occupational_info: Ray works as a division manager in the county Auditor-Controller's Office. Maureen is a registered nurse working as a shift manager in a critical care unit at a local hospital.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: We are all one. Dr. Bronner All hope is with youth! R.B. Fuller
lender.occupational_info: Make no little plans. D. Burnham

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I have never seen anything like this and it's an amazing opportunity to help in such a unique way and make a huge impact. The fact that these are loans and not donations allows everyone to help even more entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I process all types of personnel changes for a large financial company of about 15,000 people. I enjoy what I do, as well as the people I work with. I love reading about the very different types of work that the entrepreneurs on Kiva are involved in.

lender.name: C.R.
lender.loan_because: It just feels right
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice and assistance to the executive management of companies looking to grow their businesses

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: Opportunity to be a part of a bigger story
lender.occupational_info: We are the conduit to effectively manage and assure succesful real estate transactions.

lender.name: Aline & Arielle
lender.loan_because: my daughter and I like to help.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, I spend a lot of time in my garden and with my grandchildren. Wonderful time of life!!

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to give back to those in need.

lender.name: Nader
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish; feed him for a lifetime"
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and entrepreneur.

lender.name: Serenity
lender.loan_because: I need for my life to have a purpose. What better way than to provide assistance to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Currently my work involves finding ways to make my life have purpose.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: Global poverty will affect all of our children's futures.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab helping to test new medicines.

lender.name: Ron & Becky
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference...
lender.occupational_info: Becky is a Professional Photographer and Ron is a Corporate Broker and Manages an Employment Company.

lender.name: joshua
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people, who are willing to help themselves. The vast majority of the borrowers on Kiva are seeking to create value, and not simply looking for a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer in the Information Technology field. I ensure that my customers have access to network, Internet and E-Mail services.

lender.name: Jennifer & Stephen
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We are both professional actors and make our living primarily through the theatre.

lender.name: Johnston Heights Sec
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are the Johnston Heights Secondary School Kiva Club in a high school in Surrey, BC in Canada. Our goal is to promote social responsibility at Johnston Heights, and to give some insight into the power of strategic philanthropy as provided by the model of micro lending to third world entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers

lender.name: Santtu
lender.loan_because: I'd appreciate it myself, if the situation was reversed. Plus, it's simple, easy and just the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: Fiddling with computers.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe in good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I create the words behind the music.

lender.name: Solomediacion 2.0
lender.occupational_info: Nuestra actividad se centra en cuatro mbitos principales: la formacin en mediacin y resolucin de conflictos; la intervencin en conflictos, la promocin de la mediacin y la consultoria.

lender.name: Ida Therese
lender.loan_because: I can. =)

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've been broke and I've been to 3rd world countries before. Most importantly I loan because there is nothing more important than embracing your passion and entrepreneurial spirit. Everyone deserves a chance to make something of their life and follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a marine engineer on ocean going vessels. It is similar to a power plant operator on a vessel.

lender.name: Stewf
lender.loan_because: I don't really need any more stuff right now, but there were times when I did, and I was very grateful to benefit from generous lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells digital typefaces to graphic designers, magazines, newspapers, and other corporations and hobbyists. People write to me and ask what font to use. I try to recommend something that will complement their design and turn a few heads. It seems like an esoteric job, but type is really quite accessible it's everywhere you look, no matter where you live or what you do.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: microfinance is a proven and successful way for people to lift themselves out of poverty in a sustainable way. Being put in touch with people in need of support is the least I can do.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my life and family. This is such a great opporunity to help. That my little, means a lot to other folks.
lender.occupational_info: Work with Computers and Networks.

lender.name: Craig & Yvonne Dockter
lender.loan_because: Shoot. On most days, 25 bucks in the right hands can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I market unique and superior nutritional products worldwide. Check it out.

lender.name: JJ Murphy
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write about nature education, sustainable technology, foraging, wilderness survival and the writing life.

lender.name: Frode
lender.loan_because: Promises dont put food on the table

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want other people to also have a chance to fight for a better life
lender.occupational_info: I help people with health problems to get their work, life and body OK again.

lender.name: Maria Jos
lender.loan_because: I believe that abundance is there for all. Some just need a litle help!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves a chance in life!

lender.name: Dominique & Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to show my children what is right.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver. ~ 2 Corinthians 9:7
lender.occupational_info: I am just one of many,.....

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate companies for investment.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because I can make a difference, and so can you.
lender.occupational_info: Unlike some people I use work to live, and not the other way around. It's a big world, so go explore it, NOW. Speaking of which: Can you guess where this picture was taken from? (hint: French Alps)
